meanings.definition: A period of time devoted to a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: During the study session, we focused on math problems.
meanings.sent2: The yoga session helped us relax and stretch our muscles.
meanings.sent3: The painting session turned into a colorful mess when the paint spilled.
meanings.sent4: Her brainstorming session was a whirlwind of creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The cooking session filled the house with delicious aromas.

meanings.definition: A meeting or series of meetings for discussion or training.
meanings.sent1: The board members gathered for an important session to plan the event.
meanings.sent2: The training session provided valuable insights for the new employees.
meanings.sent3: The session on teamwork turned into a fun team-building exercise.
meanings.sent4: The negotiation session felt like a strategic game of chess.
meanings.sent5: The therapy session helped her work through her emotions.

meanings.definition: A period of time during which a court, parliament, or other official body meets to conduct its business.
meanings.sent1: The court session lasted for hours as they reviewed the case.
meanings.sent2: The parliamentary session addressed important legislative matters.
meanings.sent3: The session in parliament became lively with debates and discussions.
meanings.sent4: The official session was filled with procedural formalities.
meanings.sent5: The session in congress was a crucial moment for passing new laws.
